page.title: 20CREDITS PAGE
page.content: This block was investigated by three schools.Firstly by Gilesgate Comprehensive School,which was resposible for coordinating the project,compiling and entering the data collected by all three schools. It was decided for geographical purposes that it would be convenient to split the block into three.The northern section was covered by pupils of the first year of Gilesgate Junior School and supervised by Mr. Bryson. The middle section was covered by Gilesgate Comprehensive School. The data being collected by students of the lower sixth of the Sixth Form Centre, supervised by Mr.Mcgrath.The southern section covered by pupils of Shincliffe C.E.Primary School, supervised by Mr. .
